Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: abu lahab ke haath toot jaen aur vah khud satyaanaas ho jae
(aakhir) na usaka maal hee usake haath aaya aur (na) usane kamaaya
vah bahut bhadakatee huee aag mein daakhil hoga
aur usakee joroo bhee jo sar par eendhan uthae phiratee hai
aur usake gale mein batee huee rassee bandhee hai
